data.message:
I would love to go on Saturday the 9th of December as I've been really busy with collage and would just like to have some me time and also be able to spend more time with my friends. I've also never been to a concert and would absolutly love to go to one🎤😍
I would take my bestfriens jerrimae as she's dome loads for me and been there for me through the hard times this year and I would love to give something back to her just to thank her for always being there❤ #jinglebellball #capitalfm #capitalJBB
